name: Sarwar
text: Ta Ha.

name: Sarwar
text: We have sent the Quran only as reminder

name: Sarwar
text: for those who have fear (of disobeying God), not to make you, (Muhammad), miserable.

name: Sarwar
text: It is a revelation from the Creator of the earth and the high heavens.

name: Sarwar
text: The Beneficent God is dominant over the Throne (of the realm).

name: Sarwar
text: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth, all that lies between them, and lies below the earth.

name: Sarwar
text: Whether or not you express (your thoughts) in words, God certainly knows all unspoken thoughts and all that is even more difficult to find.

name: Sarwar
text: God is the only Lord and to Him belong all the exalted Names.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), have you heard the story of Moses?

name: Sarwar
text: When he saw the fire, he said to his family, "Wait here for I can see a fire. Perhaps I shall bring you a burning torch or find a way to some fire".

name: Sarwar
text: When he came near the fire he was called, "Moses,

name: Sarwar
text: I Am your Lord. Take off your shoes; you are in the holy valley of Tuwa.

name: Sarwar
text: I have chosen you as My Messengers. Listen to the revelation.

name: Sarwar
text: I Am the only God. Worship Me and be steadfast in prayer to have My name always in your mind.

name: Sarwar
text: Although it is certain that the Day of Judgment will come, I prefer to keep it almost a secret so that every soul will receive the recompense for what it has done (on its own).

name: Sarwar
text: Let not the unbelievers who follow their vain desires make you forget the Day of Judgment, lest you will perish."

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord asked, "Moses, what is in your right hand?"

name: Sarwar
text: He replied, "It is my staff. I lean on it, bring down leaves for my sheep with it and I need it for other reasons.

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord said, "Moses, throw it on the ground".

name: Sarwar
text: Moses threw it on the ground and suddenly he saw that it was a moving serpent.

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord said, "Hold the serpent and do not be afraid; We will bring it back to its original form."

name: Sarwar
text: "Now - as another Sign - place your hand under your arm and it will come out sheer white without harm (or stain).

name: Sarwar
text: This We have done to show you some of Our greater miracles.

name: Sarwar
text: Go to the Pharaoh; he has become a rebel."

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said, "Lord, grant me courage.

name: Sarwar
text: Make my task easy

name: Sarwar
text: and my tongue fluent

name: Sarwar
text: so that they may understand me.

name: Sarwar
text: Appoint a deputy (for me) from my own people.

name: Sarwar
text: Let it be my brother Aaron

name: Sarwar
text: to support me.

name: Sarwar
text: Let him be my partner in this task

name: Sarwar
text: so that we may glorify

name: Sarwar
text: and remember you often.

name: Sarwar
text: You are Well Aware of our situation."

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord said, "Moses, your request is granted.

name: Sarwar
text: It is the second time that We have bestowed upon you Our favor.

name: Sarwar
text: Remember when We inspired your mother with a certain inspiration

name: Sarwar
text: to lace her child in a chest and throw it into the sea which would hurl it towards the shore. Then an enemy of Mine who was also the enemy of the child would pick it up from there. I made you attractive and loveable so that you would be reared before My own eyes.

name: Sarwar
text: Your sister went to them and said, "May I show you someone who will nurse this child?" We returned you to your mother to make her rejoice and forget her grief. You slew a man and We saved you from trouble. We tried you through various trials. Then you stayed some years with the people of Midian (Shu'ayb and his family) and after that you came back to Egypt as was ordained.

name: Sarwar
text: I chose you for Myself.

name: Sarwar
text: "Go with your brother. Take My miracles and do not be reluctant in preaching My message.

name: Sarwar
text: Go both of you to the Pharaoh; he has become a rebel.

name: Sarwar
text: Both of you must speak with him in a gentle manner so that perhaps he may come to himself or have fear (of God)."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Lord, we are afraid of his transgression and rebellion against us".

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord replied them, "Do not be afraid; I Am with you all the time, listening and seeing."

name: Sarwar
text: They came to the Pharaoh and told him that they were the Messengerss of his Lord and that they wanted him to let the Israelites go with them and stop afflicting the Israelites with torment. They told the Pharaoh, "We have brought miracles from Our Creator. Peace be with those who follow the right guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: It is revealed to us that those who call our message a lie or turn away from it will face the torment."

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh asked them, "Who is your Lord?"

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "Our Lord is the One Who has created all things and has given guidance".

name: Sarwar
text: He then asked, "What do you know about the past generations?"

name: Sarwar
text: Moses replied, "The knowledge about it is with my Lord in the Book. My Lord is free from error and forgetfulness.

name: Sarwar
text: It is God who has made the earth as a cradle for you with roads for you to travel. He has sent water from the sky to produce various pairs of plants.

name: Sarwar
text: Consume them as food or for grazing your cattle. In this there is evidence (of the existence of God) for the people of reason".

name: Sarwar
text: We have created you from the earth to which We will return you and will bring you back to life again.

name: Sarwar
text: We showed the Pharaoh all of Our miracles, but he called them lies and turned away from them.

name: Sarwar
text: He said to Moses, "Have you come to expel us from our land through your magic?

name: Sarwar
text: We shall also answer you by magic. Let us make an appointment for a contest among us and let each of us be present at a certain time in the appointed place".

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said, "Let the contest take place on the Day of Feast so that all the people can come together during the brightness of the day."

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh returned to organize his plans and then attended the appointment.

name: Sarwar
text: Moses told them, (the magicians) "Woe to you if you invent falsehood against God; you will be destroyed by the torment. Whoever invents falsehood against God will certainly be lost."

name: Sarwar
text: They started arguing and whispering to each other

name: Sarwar
text: and said, "These two people are magicians. They want to expel you from your land through their magic and to destroy your own tradition.

name: Sarwar
text: Bring together your devices and come forward in ranks; the winner will, certainly, have great happiness".

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Moses, would you be the first to show your skill or should we be the first to throw down our devices?"

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said, "You throw first." When they did, their ropes and staffs through their magic seemed to be moving.

name: Sarwar
text: Moses felt afraid within himself.

name: Sarwar
text: We told him, "Do not be afraid for you will be the winner.

name: Sarwar
text: Throw down what is in your right hand and it will swallow up all that they have performed; theirs is only a magical performance. Magicians can find no happiness in whatever they do."

name: Sarwar
text: The magicians bowed down in prostration saying, "We believe in the Lord of Moses and Aaron".

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh said, "Since you believed in him without my permission, then Moses certainly must be your chief who has taught you magic. I shall cut your hands and feet on alternate sides and crucify you on the trunk of the palm-tree. You shall certainly find which among us can afflict a more severe and lasting punishment".

name: Sarwar
text: They (the magicians) said, "We would never prefer you to the miracles that we have seen or to our Creator. Do what you want. This life is only for a short time.

name: Sarwar
text: We have faith in our Lord so that He will forgive our sins and our magical performances that you forced us to show. God is better than all things and His rewards last longer."

name: Sarwar
text: The dwelling place of one who comes into the presence of his Lord as a criminal will be hell wherein he will never die nor enjoy his life.

name: Sarwar
text: One who comes into the presence of his Lord with faith and righteous deeds

name: Sarwar
text: will be rewarded by high status in the gardens of Eden wherein streams flow. Such will be the reward of those who purify themselves.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent revelations to Moses telling him, "Travel with My servants during the night and strike a dry road across the sea (for them). Have no fear of being overtaken (by the Pharaoh) nor of anything else".

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh and his army chased Moses and his people but were drowned by the sea.

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh and his people had gone away from guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: Children of Israel, We saved you from your enemy and promised to settle you on the right side of the peaceful Mount Tur (Sinai)

name: Sarwar
text: and We sent you manna and quails.

name: Sarwar
text: I allowed you to consume the pure sustenance which We had given you but not to become rebels, lest you become subject to My wrath. Whoever becomes subject to My wrath will certainly be destroyed. I am All-forgiving to the righteously striving believers who repent and follow the right guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord asked, "Moses, what made you attend your appointment with Me before your people?"

name: Sarwar
text: Moses replied, "They are just behind me. I came earlier to seek Your pleasure".

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord said, "We tested your people after you left them and the Samiri made them go astray."

name: Sarwar
text: Moses, sad and angry, returned to his people saying, "My people, did not the Lord make you a gracious promise? Why did you disregard your appointment with me? Was it because of the long time or did you want to become subject to the wrath of your Lord?"

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "We did not go against our promise with you out of our own accord. We were forced to carry people's ornaments. We threw them away and so did the Samiri.

name: Sarwar
text: Then the Samiri forged the body of a motionless calf which gave out a hollow sound." The people said, "This is your Lord and the Lord of Moses whom he (Moses) forgot to mention".

name: Sarwar
text: Did they not consider that the calf could not give them any answer, nor it could harm or benefit them?

name: Sarwar
text: Aaron had told them before, "My people, you are deceived by the calf. Your Lord is the Beneficent God. Follow me and obey my orders".

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "We shall continue worshipping the calf until Moses comes back."

name: Sarwar
text: Then Moses asked Aaron, "What made you not follow me when you saw them in error?

name: Sarwar
text: Did you disobey my orders?"

name: Sarwar
text: Aaron replied, "Son of my mother, do not seize me by my beard or head. I was afraid that you might consider me responsible for causing discord among the children of Israel and would not pay attention to my words."

name: Sarwar
text: Moses asked, "Samiri, what were your motives?"

name: Sarwar
text: He replied, "I had the skill (of carving) which they did not have. I followed some of the Messengers's (Moses) tradition, but I then ignored it. Thus, my soul prompted me (to carve a golden calf with an artificial hollow sound).

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said, "Go away! Throughout your life you will not be able to let anyone touch you. This will be your punishment in this life. The time for your final punishment is inevitable. You will never be able to avoid it. Look at your god which you have been worshipping. We will burn it in the fire and scatter its ashes into the sea."

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is the One who is the only God and He has the knowledge of all things.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus We tell you, (Muhammad), the stories of the past and We have given you the Quran.

name: Sarwar
text: Whoever disregards (the Quran) will be heavily burdened with sin on the Day of Judgment

name: Sarwar
text: with which he will live forever. On the Day of Judgment it will be a terrible load for him to carry.

name: Sarwar
text: On the day when the trumpet will be sounded We will raise the criminals from their graves and their eyes will be turned blue and blind.

name: Sarwar
text: They will slowly talk to each other and say, "Our life on earth was as short as ten days".

name: Sarwar
text: We know best what they say. The moderate ones among them will say, "You did not live on earth for more than a day."

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), they will ask you about the mountains. Tell them, "My Lord will grind them to powder

name: Sarwar
text: and leave them so smoothly levelled

name: Sarwar
text: that you will see no depression or elevation in it".

name: Sarwar
text: On that day they will follow their caller without deviation. Their voices will be low in the presence of the Beneficent God. You will hear nothing but the tread of the marching feet.

name: Sarwar
text: On that day no one's intercession will be of any benefit unless he has received permission from the Beneficent God and whose word is acceptable to Him.

name: Sarwar
text: God knows all that is in front of them and behind them and they can not encompass His knowledge.

name: Sarwar
text: Faces will be humble before the Everlasting and the Self-existing God. Despair will strike those who are loaded with the burden of injustice.

name: Sarwar
text: The righteously striving believers should have no fear of being treated with injustice or inequity.

name: Sarwar
text: We have revealed the Quran in the Arabic language containing various warnings so that it may cause them to have fear (of God) or take heed.

name: Sarwar
text: God is the Most High and the True King. (Muhammad), do not be hasty in reading the Quran to the people before the revelation has been completed. "Say, My Lord, grant me more knowledge."

name: Sarwar
text: We had commanded Adam (certain matters). He forgot Our commandment and We did not find in him the determination to fulfil Our commandments.

name: Sarwar
text: When We told the angels to prostrate before Adam they all obeyed except Iblis (satan) who refused.

name: Sarwar
text: We said, "Adam, this (satan) is your enemy and the enemy of your spouse. Let him not expel you and your spouse from Paradise lest you plunge into misery.

name: Sarwar
text: In Paradise you will experience no hunger, nakedness,

name: Sarwar
text: thirst, or exposure to the hot Sun."

name: Sarwar
text: Satan, trying to seduce him, said, "Adam, do you want me to show you the Tree of Eternity and the Everlasting Kingdom?"

name: Sarwar
text: Adam and his wife ate (fruits) from the tree and found themselves naked. Then they started to cover themselves with the leaves from the garden. Adam disobeyed his Lord and went astray.

name: Sarwar
text: His Lord forgave him, accepted his repentance, and gave him guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: God then told them, "Get out of here all of you; you are each other's enemies. When My guidance comes to you, those who follow it will not go astray nor will they endure any misery.

name: Sarwar
text: Whoever ignores My guidance will live a woeful life and will be brought in Our presence blind on the Day of Judgment.

name: Sarwar
text: He will say, "My Lord, why have you brought me back to life blind; before I could see?"

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord will say, "This is true. But just as you forgot Our revelations that had come to you, so, too, are you forgotten on this day."

name: Sarwar
text: Thus We recompense those who are unjust and have no faith in Our revelations. The torment in the life to come will be more severe and last longer.

name: Sarwar
text: Is it not a warning for them to see how many generations living before them We destroyed and how they are now walking in their ruins? In this there is the evidence (of the Truth) for the people of reason.

name: Sarwar
text: Had not the word of your Lord been decreed (otherwise), the unbelievers deserved immediate punishment. The appointed time for their punishment will inevitably come.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), have patience with what they say, glorify your Lord, and always praise Him before sunrise, sunset, in some hours of the night and at both the beginning and end of the day, so that perhaps you will please your Lord.

name: Sarwar
text: Do not be envious of what We have given to some people as means of enjoyment and worldly delight. Such means are a trial for them, but the reward that you will receive from your Lord will be far better and everlasting.

name: Sarwar
text: Instruct your family to pray and to be steadfast in their worship. We do not ask any sustenance from you; it is We who give you sustenance. Know that piety will have a happy end.

name: Sarwar
text: They have said, "Why has he, (Muhammad), not brought some miracle from his Lord?" Have they not received the previously revealed heavenly Books as the evidence of the Truth.

name: Sarwar
text: Had We destroyed them with a torment before the coming of Muhammad they would have said, "Lord, would that you had sent us a Messengers so that we could have followed Your revelations before being humiliated and disgraced."

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), tell them, "Everyone is waiting. Wait and you shall know very soon who will be the followers of the right path with the right guidance."
